__comment1__: ServiceTypes values are: 0 for 'Formatting' and 1 for 'Maintenance'
__comment2__: HostnamePattern must follow .NET Regex rules specified on https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/standard/base-types/regular-expressions
__comment3__: AssetNumberDigitLimit, SealNumberDigitLimit, RoomNumberDigitLimit and TicketNumberDigitLimit must be adjusted to match your business rules
